description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军前少将，前陆军第三十八集团军军长。因在六四事件中拒绝执行戒严命令而被撤职、判刑。
description.en: A former Major General of the People's Liberation Army and former Commander of the 38th Group Army. He was dismissed and sentenced for refusing to enforce martial law orders during the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的集团军之一，在1989年六四事件中是徐勤先指挥的部队。
description.en: One of the group armies of the PLA Ground Force, which was commanded by Xu Qinxian during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 徐勤先曾就读的军事院校。
description.en: The military academy where Xu Qinxian studied.

description.zh-cn: 1984年中国人民解放军举行的大规模军事演习。
description.en: A large-scale military exercise conducted by the People's Liberation Army in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，时任中共中央军委主席。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from 1978 to 1989, and the Chairman of the Central Military Commission at the time of the Tiananmen Square protests.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China
Martial law during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，时任北京军区副司令员。
description.en: A general of the PLA, who was the Deputy Commander of the Beijing Military Region at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，时任中共中央总书记、中央军委第一副主席。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader in China, who was the General Secretary of the Communist Party of China and First Vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission at the time.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事法院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事法院
en: Military Court of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部直属监狱，以关押高级别政治犯而闻名。
description.en: A prison under the Ministry of Public Security of the PRC, known for holding high-ranking political prisoners.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党史专家，毛泽东前政治秘书，中共党内自由派的代表人物。
description.en: An expert on the history of the Communist Party of China, a former political secretary to Mao Zedong, and a representative of the liberal faction within the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，徐勤先的前任第38集团军军长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, Xu Qinxian's predecessor as commander of the 38th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，徐勤先的继任第38集团军军长。
description.en: A major general of the PLA, Xu Qinxian's successor as commander of the 38th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 1950年朝鲜战争爆发后，徐勤先因年龄不足被拒参军，为此咬破手指写血书要求参军才被接受。
description.en: After the Korean War broke out in 1950, Xu Qinxian was initially rejected for military service due to his age. He was only accepted after writing a pledge in his own blood.

description.zh-cn: 徐勤先是1984年华北大演习的指挥者之一。
description.en: Xu Qinxian was one of the commanders of the 1984 North China Military Exercise.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 徐勤先曾任第38集团军副军长，后升任军长。
description.en: Xu Qinxian served as Deputy Commander and was later promoted to Commander of the 38th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 1988年被授予少将军衔，1989年5月被开除军籍。
description.en: He was awarded the rank of Major General in 1988 and was expelled from the military in May 1989.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，邓小平签署了调动部队进京执行天安门清场任务的命令。
description.en: As the Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Deng Xiaoping signed the order to mobilize troops into Beijing to carry out the Tiananmen Square clearance mission.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央军委下达了调兵进京执行戒严的命令。
description.en: The Central Military Commission issued the order to mobilize troops into Beijing to enforce martial law.

description.zh-cn: 在接到执行戒严的命令后，徐勤先以“口头命令我无法执行，需要书面命令”为由拒绝在调兵令上签字，从而拒绝执行任务。
description.en: After receiving the order to enforce martial law, Xu Qinxian refused to sign the troop deployment order and thus refused to carry out the mission, stating, "I cannot execute a verbal order, a written order is required."

description.zh-cn: 时任北京军区副司令的李来柱向徐勤先宣布了中央军委调兵戒严的命令。
description.en: Li Laizhu, then Deputy Commander of the Beijing Military Region, announced the Central Military Commission's order to mobilize troops and enforce martial law to Xu Qinxian.

description.zh-cn: 徐勤先拒绝执行命令的理由是：军委第一副主席赵紫阳没有签署命令，军令不全、不合法，因此不能执行。
description.en: Xu Qinxian's reason for refusing the order was that Zhao Ziyang, the First Vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission, had not signed it, making the military order incomplete, illegal, and therefore unenforceable.

description.zh-cn: 因其在六四事件中的抗命行为，徐勤先被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: Xu Qinxian was expelled from the Communist Party of China for his insubordination during the Tiananmen Square events.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军军事法院

description.zh-cn: 因其在六四事件中的抗命行为，徐勤先被军事法院判处五年有期徒刑。
description.en: For his insubordination during the Tiananmen Square events, Xu Qinxian was sentenced to five years in prison by a military court.

description.zh-cn: 徐勤先在秦城监狱服刑。
description.en: Xu Qinxian served his prison sentence at Qincheng Prison.

description.zh-cn: 出狱后，徐勤先的待遇由正军级降为副军级，其档案显示职务为河北省军区副司令员。
description.en: After his release from prison, Xu Qinxian's status was demoted from full-corps level to deputy-corps level, and his official records list his position as Deputy Commander of the Hebei Military District.

description.zh-cn: 李锐与徐勤先有深交，并曾赋诗称赞其在六四事件中的行为是“一代豪雄硬脊梁”。
description.en: Li Rui had a deep friendship with Xu Qinxian and wrote a poem praising his actions during the Tiananmen Square events as being the 'strong backbone of a generation's hero'.

description.zh-cn: 徐勤先接替李际均，担任中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军军长。
description.en: Xu Qinxian succeeded Li Jijun as the commander of the PLA's 38th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 在徐勤先因抗命被撤职后，张美远接替其担任中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军军长。
description.en: After Xu Qinxian was dismissed for insubordination, Zhang Meiyuan succeeded him as the commander of the PLA's 38th Group Army.
